TestCaseMetaData.name: Partial result to final header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to process the progression from a "partial" to "final" report.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to create partial and final results message.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the systems' capability to produce a "partial" and a "final" report.
